inclusion.criterion: ability to come for one additional visit in outpatient diabetes clinic
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: no possibility to download data from patient's glucometer and insulin pump
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: patient is homeless and lost his supply of glucometer, syringes, etc.

notes: Patient has had previous episodes of diabetic ketoacidosis but appears well with current episode of hyperglycemia.
